title: Assignment
description: Represents the association of a Person with an Event (i.e. the person is assigned to the event).

personId.description: The unique id of the person assigned.

eventId.description: The unique id of the event that the person is assigned to.

updateUser.description: The username of the person responsible for creating the assignment. Note: assignments are not updated.

updateDttm.description: The date and time when the assignment was created. Note: assignments are not updated.
